review: I am extremely pleased with the Amazon Fire Stick! It more than met my expectations.
author: Kenda

review: Advertise 100s to 1,000s of free movies etc. Only through 30 intro to Amazon Fire and only on select items. After that you can go to Red Box and rent the same things for $1.... Rip Off ! No advantage here.
author: E. McDougall

review: EASY TO INSTALL.WORKED EXACTLY AS EXPECTED.
author: GANDALF THE WHITE

review: Awesome...except the battery compartment was impossible to open, which I saw for many was an issue. Crazy cool technology - should be a "snap" to change the batteries.
author: Zack

review: I am enjoying my Fire TV Stick. It was so easy to set-up and to use. Well worth the price.
author: Windy

review: Can't wait to try this out.
author: Amazon Customer

review: loved to Chromecast, love this even more. Easy to set up and use, tons of things to watch. My wife and I love the Fire Stick!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love the fire stick - works great and streams like a dream. Highly recommend!!!
author: M. Gosney "daizijane"

review: I love this! I got it last night, and it was VERY easy to set up. It also comes with a few instructional videos to guide you through how to do things. I love that I don't have to watch Netflix on my iPad anymore, or even YouTube videos! Also, if you're an Amazon Prime member, you can add things to your watchlist directly from this. I definitely recommend this.
author: jen
